description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 6x + 5.
comments: n, 6*n+5, 36*n+35 and 216*n+215 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..150000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(6*n+5) and IsPrime(36*n+35) and IsPrime(216*n+215)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
